skill.name: Unlocking the Enforcer
skill.normal: Unlocks the ability to place an ammo bag.

skill.name: Oppressor
skill.normal: Your weapons are 25% more effective at threatening enemies.
skill.ace: Your weapons are 50% more effective at threatening enemies.

skill.name: Bullet Storm
skill.normal: ADirectly after you deploy an ammo bag, you can fire your weapon for 5 seconds without depleting your ammunition.
skill.ace: You can fire 10 seconds longer without depleting your ammunition.

skill.name: Transporter
skill.normal: You move 50% faster when carrying bags

skill.name: Die Hard
skill.normal: You can use your primary weapon in bleedout.
skill.ace: Your armor recovery rate is increased by 15%.

skill.name: UnderDog
skill.normal: When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, you receive a 15% damage bonus.
skill.ace: When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, you receive 15% less damage from enemies.

skill.name: Pumping Iron
skill.normal: Your melee attacks against non-special enemies deal 50% more damage.
skill.ace: Your melee attacks against special enemies deal 50% more damage.

skill.name: Shotgun Impact
skill.normal: Your weapon stability with shotguns is increased by 25%.
skill.ace: You deal 35% more damage with shotguns.

skill.name: Stun Resistance
skill.normal: Reduces the visual effect duration of flashbangs by 25%.
skill.ace: Further reduces the visual effect duration by 50%.

skill.name: Tough Guy
skill.normal: Reduces your camera shake by 50% when you are damaged by enemy fire.
skill.ace: Your bleedout health is increased by 25%.

skill.name: Shotgun CQB
skill.normal: Increases your shotgun reload speed by 50%.
skill.ace: Increases your shotgun steel sight speed by 125%.

skill.name: Ammo Specialist
skill.normal: You can now place 2 ammo bags instead of just one.
skill.ace: Each ammo bag contains additional 200% ammo.

skill.name: Beserker
skill.normal: The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below 25%, you will do up to 250% more melee and saw damage.
skill.ace: When your health is below 25%, you will do up to 100% more damage with ranged weapons.

skill.name: Hard Boiled
skill.normal: Increases your shotgun weapon accuracy by 20% when firing from the hip.
skill.ace: Increases your weapon accuracy by 20% when firing from the hip with all weapons.

skill.name: Fully Loaded
skill.normal: Your total ammo capacity is increased by 25%.
skill.ace: Increases your ammo pickup to 175% of the normal rate.

skill.name: Portable Saw
skill.normal: Unlocks the OVE9000 portable saw for you to use.
skill.ace: Increases your saw blade amount by 1.

skill.name: Overkill
skill.normal: When you kill an enemy using a shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw, you receive a 75% damage bonus for 5 seconds.
skill.ace: The damage bonus now applies to all weapons. Skill must still be activated using a shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw.

skill.name: Iron Man
skill.normal: Unlocks the ability to wear the Improved Combined Tactical Vest.
skill.ace: When you melee Shield enemies, they get knocked back by the sheer force. Run and shoot â€“ you can now shoot from the hip while sprinting.

skill.name: Carbon Blade
skill.normal: You replace your saw blades with carbon blades, increasing your saw efficiency by 20%.
skill.ace: Attacking enemies with the OVE9000 portable saw wears it down 50% less than before. Saws are 20% more effective. You can use the OVE9000 portable saw as a secondary weapon.
